title: Discover the Artefact's Secrets
content:
's Secrets Objectives

Objective 1: Find out more about the artefact. Dror Ragzlin, the goblin king, spoke of the artefact we carry. He is trying to gain information about its whereabouts from a dead mind flayer. It must be powerful. We should find out more about it. Shadowheart carries a strange artefact. It seemed to protect us from a horrible voice. She stubbornly avoids the subject. We should find out more about it. Objective 2: Find the Githyanki Creche. The githyanki are looking for the ar
